summary: Renames gold to "septim" and gives them custom weights.
descriptionHtml:
This mod renames "gold" to "septim" for immersion and gives it a weight of .05 because I did the math and that is the approximate weight of some pre-1900s gold dollars.  It bothered me that other mods were .1 or .0005 once I figured out a more accurate weight so BAM here we are.

Thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7580110]Chieron26[/url] pointing out a couple things, I've uploaded a version that is weighted based on a United States gold dollar (.01) and a version that makes more economic sense when one would think about something's weight in gold (.001).

I bet there's a way to create an MCM menu to just allow for a slider so each person could choose their ideal weight. I have no clue how to do that so there's a project for anyone out there reading this. 

I hope you enjoy this little change! :D

PS.  This mod is fairly unnecessary if you're using Requiem


If you don't like this here's a few alternatives:
